categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Nomi was a female Selonian advocate and supporter of the Rebel Alliance. She was killed during the Galactic Civil War.
Nomi's corpse appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
